profile.name: Dr. George Anderson
profile.title: Clinical Pharmacist & Healthcare Consultant
profile.tagline: Empowering better health through personalized pharmaceutical care

bio.short: Clinical pharmacist with 15+ years of experience in patient care, medication therapy management, and healthcare consulting.
bio.full:
Dr. George Anderson is a board-certified clinical pharmacist with over 15 years of experience in direct patient care, medication therapy management, and healthcare consulting. He specializes in chronic disease management, particularly diabetes and cardiovascular health, and has helped thousands of patients optimize their medication regimens for better health outcomes.

Dr. Anderson is a sought-after speaker at healthcare conferences and has published numerous articles on pharmaceutical care best practices. He is passionate about reducing medication errors, improving patient adherence, and advancing the role of pharmacists in modern healthcare.

credentials.title: Certified Diabetes Care and Education Specialist (CDCES)

achievements.title: Published Author
achievements.organization: Journal of the American Pharmacists Association
